title: Section
description: A section block hosts structured content for the parent.

blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: An ordered set of block elements which are rendered after the title & abstract of the parent section and before any subsections.

sections.title: Sections
sections.description: An ordered set of sections, which are children of the parent section or the main surface, and which are rendered after the parent’s blocks. Sections are used to determine a view’s table of contents.
